## hasDuplicates() function

Determines whether an array has duplicates.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function hasDuplicates<Item extends keyof Primitive>(array: Item[]): boolean;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

array


</td><td>

Item\[\]


</td><td>

input


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

boolean

true if array has duplicates, false otherwise.

## Example


```ts
hasDuplicates(["one", "one", "two"]) // true
hasDuplicates([1, 2, 3, 3]) // true
hasDuplicates(["one", "two", "three"]) // false
```
